meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by spastic paralysis.
meanings.sent1: The spastic muscles made it hard for him to walk smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the spastic movements were due to a neurological condition.
meanings.sent3: The spastic dance moves at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her spastic attempts at juggling the balls were entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent5: The spastic nature of the robot's movements made it seem almost human.

meanings.definition: A person affected by spastic paralysis.
meanings.sent1: The spastic struggled to control his movements.
meanings.sent2: She met a spastic at the rehabilitation center who inspired her with his determination.
meanings.sent3: The spastic at the gym always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The spastic on the track team never let his condition hold him back.
meanings.sent5: The spastic's perseverance in the face of challenges was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A person who is clumsy or uncoordinated in movement.
meanings.sent1: The new student was labeled as a spastic by his classmates.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about being called a spastic by her peers.
meanings.sent3: The spastic in the dance class tripped over their own feet but kept smiling.
meanings.sent4: Despite being called a spastic, he never gave up trying to improve his coordination.
meanings.sent5: The spastic's awkward movements somehow added charm to their performance.
